item.title: 15th Slides
item.description: Deadline: April 27, 2020, by 5:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time) Assignment Requirement Template Readings: PR Review, Social Media and PR 1. Name & Challenge Name: Please think up a name that resonates with the caf√©’s original purposes: to offer organic, free trade, and/or locally sourced coffee, pastries, sandwiches, and salads. Challenges: Try to put yourself in the shoe of the owner of this cafe, and think of challenges that you may have.
